title: Hey Shaco Mains
body: On behalf of the Old Malzahar Mains I just wanted to welcome you to the "My champ got shot and a double took his place" club.

replies.body: I think I need to make room for some Kata too.

My friend, who got to D5 once with Katarina, is pretty upset.

Excited about being able to jump more

Bitter about Lee Sin still being able to ward hop

Meanwhile, I'm still bitter over Malzahar.
